column4: +++ Important Message: The current Chromium webbrowser on Natty, version "12.0.742.112 (90304) Ubuntu 11.04", does _not_ reject DigiNotar certificates!! Please please fix this!
it will not help posting that here. If you think it is a bug, you launchpad to report
you can use PPA as archae suggested, but please be aware that PPA's are unsupported 3rd party repositories
thanks, just wanted to share this because I think it's very important for people to know, especially those who don't read the bug list.
this is not the correct place for that
